welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nesconset, a charming town known for its quaint streets, friendly locals, and delicious food. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport offers a variety of amenities, including restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport is a modern and spacious facility, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the airport offers a separate terminal with VIP services and amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
